name: Phanaeus Luz
description:
Play as Herc the beetle, as you solve puzzles through a mysterious cave. 

Herc flips blocks upside-down, revealing a part of the story on the undersides of each block.

Big thanks to @Grognak and @Bakruu for vigorously playtesting my game. Thanks to @Deadminves and @Imgoinghamm for helping with testing as well.

Also, big thanks to my wife for making the cover art.
